Negative_Review: The staff were less welcoming than previously they seemed rushed and a bit grumpy
Positive_Review: The standard of the breakfast has dropped since we last visited horrible eggs overcooked bacon dry sausages etc I m sure this can be easily remedied

Negative_Review: Bathroom door could use a hook to hang your robe somewhere Also the closet could use more hangers Very minor issues
Positive_Review: Excellent Hotel bed was nice a and firm Hotel was very quite good sleeping after busy days Hotel is newer everything was clean and bright Excellent breakfast with great variety and quality foods Hotel is in an excellent area being next to the Vauxhall train underground station A couple of nice pubs within a block s distance Would recommend to anyone business couples family

Negative_Review: Very close to the river but sadly no view We had a studio apartment the overall room size was good but the sofa was squashed in between the bed TV Lots of cupboard space a wardrobe but difficult to know where to put my suitcase I just left it stood up against the wall
Positive_Review: Very good experience comfortable room friendly staff short walk from Vauxhall station and the river Breakfast included plenty of choice and was open for 3 hours each morning Everything was clean tidy well maintained We arrived early on day 1 and the staff arranged for our room to be made up straight away AirCon worked well We didn t really use the kitchen area but it was nice to have a fridge Bathroom very spacious Would stay again would recommend to others

Negative_Review: I think the housekeeping could have been better in terms of changing bedsheets regularly It will also help to have bigger more trashcans There can also be more ventilation in the gym It was in the basement and felt a bit stuffy
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great atmosphere cozy Thanks for providing a handy phone in the room that we can use to take out The room size was also decent

Negative_Review: No parking on site nearest secure parking is quite a walk away There are 3 free parking spaces outside on the road but no guarantee these will be available they were already taken when we stayed None of the usual hotel extras like sewing kit shower cap body moisturiser which I asked for during our stay but even housekeeping didn t have them Shampoo conditioner and shower gel were however in the room and were nice quality Room smelled a little smokey as if the previous guest had smoked in there
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful I cannot praise the staff enough one was even happy to help with outfit choice for a wedding I was attending Bed pillows and duvet were very comfortable Very handy having a small kitchen in room Good wifi connection and TV with Netflix BBC iPlayer etc Access to complimentary coffee tea during the day Nice smelling shampoo shower gel Good aircon in room Breakfast was fine also had a gluten free section

Negative_Review: Only suggestion to have small mirror in washroom for shaving
Positive_Review: Clean new property Has all facilities in room iron kettle kitchen facilities good water pressure and hot water
EXCELLENT LOCATION NICE BREAKFAST BEAUTIFUL ROOMS WITH FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN FREE MOBILE PHONE WITH INLAND CALLS AND INTERNET TEAM VERY POLITE AND HELPFUL CLOSE TO TUBE BICYCLE RENT LOVELY TEAHOUSE

The staff were very helpful and friendly the rooms were clean as was the hotel there is a good choice for breakfast love the little pancake making machine the beds were comfy and it was also very quiet so was able to get a good nights sleep

Negative_Review: A little bit far distant from papular sites in London but there is a underground station nearby The shower power was too small
Positive_Review: Good breakfast and 24 hr drinks for free nice staff and great room

The hosts were amazing I want to thank 2 amazing staff members Yane Oxana i think it was her name she wore black frame glasses she is tall with dark hair She was very helpful She made us feel very much at home

Negative_Review: What we didn t like was that the Instructions for micro wave oven were wrong
Positive_Review: I liked the 24 hour a day coffee station and the easy of travel through Vauxhall station was easy The corner pub had good food as well Good room side had good nights sleep liked the kitchenette set up and space to hang and store clothes

Negative_Review: the bed was a bit hard
Positive_Review: we felt at home very clean the handy in the room was extremly useful with the handy you can look for attractions restaurants underground map etc
I like the spacious room and the amenities inside The room is cleaned regularly Handy phone for use of the guest was efficient Breakfast was amazing

The hotel is very comfortable and tastefully furnished The rooms are clean spacious and bright with fully equipped kitchenette and Nespresso machine There is also a Handy in a room an excellent help when travelling around the city finding places The hotel staff are all very friendly and helpful and the hotel dog Waggers just adorable The breakfast is great as is the lovely lounge area where free tea and coffee is available all day The neighbourhood is quiet and tidy This hotel is really a home away from home We will certainly be back
Good buffet breakfast Well located for access to Southbank less than ten minutes to Vauxhall station Spacious room very clean Black Dog pub just a few yards away which does good food

Negative_Review: The bed and pillows are really not comfortable at all Hotel doesn t provide bathrobes The breakfast while you will definitely find something to fill youp up I have certainly had way better breakfasts in other hotels
Positive_Review: Size of the room Well equipped rooms including microwave dishwasher and utensils 3 FREE parking spots right infront of the hotel you need to be lucky though Coffee served throughout the day Very nice touch from the staff card chocolate and bottle of wine in the room as it was a birthday occasion a big thank you Very helpful staff WI FI was good enough

Negative_Review: heavy rain followed by snowy storm
Positive_Review: Great appart hotel where the owners are very client oriented Location is convenient 5 min from Vauhal tube and big bus stations A pleasant and eye catching walk along embankment in 3 bridges distance will take you to Big Ben place Free handy for the whole stay socializing parties with wine and tasty snacks 4 times a week spacious rooms smart tv set radio with alarm aux etc I travel a lot and would put this hotel in my top 5 s Highly recommend to cut the long story short

Negative_Review: This is a gem A longer stay would have been perfectly acceptable
Positive_Review: This was our 2nd stay in two months Located on a quiet backstreet its a lovely warm friendly environment The family style is brought home in the Breakfast area with great food and relaxed seating Our suite was large comfortable clean and in splendid decorative order The whole place is clean and everything works well Vauxhall bus train and tube stations are a 10 minute walk Highly recommended

Staff were wonderful and welcoming Always available to help Little extras like evening drinks and food New comfortable We had great weather and like to walk so the location in the south area was fine but a bit distant from central events Metro not far bus easy and convenient Quiet compared to our earlier rental in the more convenient Covenant Garden area

Negative_Review: Quality of cooked breakfast poor sausages were tasteless rashers very hard no nice fresh fruit asked for grapes got a few that were dried up Beds were hard
Positive_Review: friendly staff tea coffee facilities hot showers and most of all the cleanliness excellent near metro station

We had a Studio suite perfect for a couple and great value including a great Buffet breakfast Everything you need to cook or eat out and a handy Smartphone to use during your stay Best value I have found in London

New and good located just a few minutes walk to underground train bus station To Oxford circuit only a few stops And Handy mobile phone is free provided to house guest to carry along to make calls and get online What an good experience

One of my best accommodation experiences Great facilities such as coffee and tea 24h day and a kitchen Also the afternoon events during the week are fabulous especially after a long day either for tourists or in a business trip Very close to the city center with the underground and to the most famous attractions on foot as well Staff is very polite and helpful

A new hotel new facilities a large and spacious room a quiet location a nice fully equipped kitchen excellent wi fi good breakfast kind and very helpful staff five minutes from the tube but it is not a central location as they indicated in the hotel site

Negative_Review: I have nothing negative at all to say
Positive_Review: This place is a gem Spotless room was beautiful and that bathroom perfect The staff could not have been more helpful Will be staying here again

Negative_Review: Being VERY picky 1 Another coffee machine 2 Queue for toaster can block those wanting to get to tea bags milk
Positive_Review: Put at ease relaxing family environment

Negative_Review: The room we were allocated was a Disabled Room As non disabled people the shower in particular was very challenging especially as we are both tall In addition the lighting in the room was poor with no dressing table facilities making getting ready for a night out quite difficult
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was good The staff were great and the hotel was very clean modern and friendly
we arrived at 8AM in the morning and we can straightaway enter our room without any additional cost thanks to Mr Luca Room is spacious and clean Very highly recommended

Negative_Review: I don t like having to be so honest about how great this hotel is as I m afraid it ll be booked out years in advance and maybe priced beyond my means
Positive_Review: Been on the road for a month this was by far the best hotel and best hotel experience
The staff were the most polite hotel staff I have ever experienced The room was modern and immaculate the location ideal not too loud but not in the middle of nowhere and the breakfast superb

Negative_Review: I don t have a bad thing to say
Positive_Review: Room was very spacious especially compared to most London rooms Staff was very friendly Breakfast was delicious

Wonderful and friendly staff Variety of breakfast food Free 24 hours coffee and tea 7 minutes walk from Vauxhall station buses underground metro and train that connects you to almost every place you would like to visit in London Free social evening treat on every Tuesday Wednesday and Thursday Again Staybridge friendly staff made our family trip more comfortable and enjoyable It is rare to see a hotel staff that works as a family and enjoys every minute of their time with their guests For a family it s a beautiful place to stay in London

Negative_Review: The bed was a bit uneven however it didn t stop me sleeping
Positive_Review: Lovely spacious room quiet and air con Plentiful breakfast good beans on toast juice muesli and pastries

Negative_Review: No bottle of water you only can buy it and very weak Wifi
Positive_Review: Size of the room kitchen full equipped and the location is near to Pimlico and Westminester

Staff very friendly and accommodating breakfast was very impressive location very close to tube bus station pub room very modern and comfortable and kitchenette had everything required Very impressed and will stay again

Negative_Review: It was a fair walk to good restaurants
Positive_Review: The overall feel of the hotel was friendly and welcoming The hotel was quiet and the walk through the pleasure gardens to get on the bus was a good way to start your day
The best staff service was exceptional Studio suite was great with a well fitted out kitchenette Location was very good 2 miles or less to most popular spots in London

Negative_Review: The fire alarms we had two during our stay due to guests who could not cook I thought I had booked a one bedroom but we only had a studio which was roomy but did not provide the separation I was wanting
Positive_Review: Nice and new and modern Great having kitchen facilities Great breakfast spread The social hour on Tues Wed and Thurs evening On site laundry Great location close to the tube and rail station A block to the embankment Quiet street Close to bike rental station Friendly helpful staff

Negative_Review: Although everything else was excellant and the location was good with easy access to public transportation you did have to be careful about going too far in certain directions It is located near a sketchy neighborhood We needed to mail some packages and had to venture through an adjacent area It was definitely not a very safe area As long as you are near the hotel and the major areas it is a great place to stay
Positive_Review: Great location within walking distance to public transportation Wonderful breakfast Friendly helpful staff Very nice room
Great cool rooms temp and appearance very relaxing with great facilities Charming staff especially the two girls on reception initials G G sorry forgot your full names

A large comfortable room well appointed bathroom and kitchenette plus attention to detail make it feel like a home away from home Friendly staff and Waggers the adorable hotel dog a deliberate and successful attempt to make the hotel feel more like a home made our stay very present My wife and I will make this our regular base when In London They even left a gift of wine and chocolates as it was our anniversary a lovely touch

Negative_Review: No complaints about anything Wifi wasn t the easiest to connect to but not to worry about
Positive_Review: Lovely facilities in the room Mini shop available at the reception Couldn t ask for more Had an extremely wonderful time Staff were as kind and even though we didn t get to meet the dog we ve never felt so welcomed at a hotel before Would definitely come again

My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in a studio suite The room was a good size especially for London and very clean and modern The hotel is in a good location close to train and bus stops and only one block back from the Thames Breakfast was fantastic The free guest laundry was a great service

Negative_Review: location hardly known needs better signs and directional signs A shuttle service out would help as area feels spooky in the nighttime
Positive_Review: Spacious rooms clean good breakfast

Negative_Review: Waggles the dog did not put in an appearance The location behind the railway arches would put me off staying there if I was on my own Having said that the public transport connections are very good
Positive_Review: Great breakfast Friendly helpful staff Nice bar area for relaxing after a night out We saw other guests order carry out pizza with the help of staff That together with kitchen facilities meant it was not necessary to eat out for every meal

Negative_Review: It was great that breakfast was provided but the hot foods weren t very appetizing
Positive_Review: It was such a bonus having the suite facilities the microwave sink fridge and dishwasher The main floor reception area was like a welcoming living room I felt safe and at home

Negative_Review: Bathroom a bit odd Shower calcified
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent Staff friendly All day coffee and tea really nice Quiet spacious and comfortable room

Negative_Review: Nothing One of the best stays we had
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel Not sure where to even start There s the free breakfast which changes daily meaning never bored 24 hour filtered water coffee and tea Then there s the laundry and gym Amazing room with fantastic bathroom a short walk from Vauxhall metro There s not much in the surrounds of Vauxhall though do recommend the rose a cute little pub around the corner from the hotel If you re up for a walk head to the river Thames and in 30 mins you can be outside Big Ben Westminster Abbey and the London eye Perfect spot for us not too touristy but easily accessible to all the main attractions either on foot or metro
Really impressed Great value for money The staff were very friendly and welcoming Surprised by the gym was of a good spec Will definitely be returning in the future

I have never stayed at a Staybridge before I like the concept and layout My room was big and very comfortable and spotlessly clean The shop at reception is a great idea And the hotel dog is a great touch

Negative_Review: The only thing I can think of are the hard pillows
Positive_Review: The staff are so helpful and friendly We had to leave early due to a family illness and they were so understanding Also so close to Vauxhall station and a great little pub down the road called the Black Dog

Negative_Review: It s a very good location though there is a bit of noise because of railway lines is near by
Positive_Review: Room is very clean with kitchenware and the suites offers free laundry Breakfast is delicious too It s just 10 minutes walk to Vauxhall tube station to go Green Park Oxfore Street and Heathrow airport where can also take buses May walk along the Thames to see beautiful Parliment building and big ben which are just opposite river

The atmosphere created by the staff and design of the hotel are genuinely welcoming and made me feel at home literally I appreciate the mix of hotel services with the options to do things myself such as laundry and cooking It s a place I would return to again and again
Hotel was in a great location Close to all the main attractions food was excellent The rooms where very modern with own sky which was great Very comfy and homely

Great concept location was perfect breakfast good and cosy rooms were clean and comfortable very friendly staff Especially ability to e g take a cup of coffee in the evening and sit in the lounge made it feel like home

Negative_Review: The location was a little away from the main area so in order to reach busier areas you had to travel but it s still close to an underground so that wasn t too much of a problem
Positive_Review: They have regular events for example a social hour on Thursdays The staff was friendly clearly knew what they were doing and the rooms were nice and considerably spacey

Negative_Review: Maybe a bit more gym equipment but everything else was great
Positive_Review: Had an amazing stay here The staff were brilliant and whenever we had an enquiry or needed a hand they were there for us Will definitely be back
Good location and friendly staff Rooms are excellent and very clean and the breakfast has a good choice We would definitely stay again without hesitation

Negative_Review: the pantry shop prices were a bit on the steep side recommend you walk round the corner to the local shop wifi was a bit iffy
Positive_Review: the apartment was great enough room and the kitchen area had everything you needed right down to a dish washer bed was comfortable the lounge area of the hotel spacious

Negative_Review: The only thing that was a nuisance was the trouble connecting and speed of the wifi in the room
Positive_Review: From entering the hotel to leaving there was a nice relaxed atmosphere the staff were very helpful and polite we really liked the layout and amenities of the room we will hopefully be using the same chain in a leisure trip to Newcastle in March
Staff were amazing Hotel has limited parking nearby 10 mins walk from Vauxhall Station Number 87 bus from Vauxhall takes 25 mins to West Wnd

Negative_Review: The breakfast was good but it wasn t great There was a lot of ready out of the box type of foods The presentation was nice but I would like a little more food that is prepared
Positive_Review: The hotel location is perfect for sight seeing and is close to the underground The food sold at the snack area is high quality There is also a good bar and grill just a few meters away called The Black Dog Overall the hotel looks modern the beds are comfortable the hotel staff was friendly spoke many languages and my wife and I were extremely satisfied with our stay 5 out of 5 stars for sure

Negative_Review: Problems with the air conditioning too cold and too noisy had to change rooms twice and the last one smelt of curry due to the last long stay guest
Positive_Review: Friendliness and helpfulness of the staff especially Vahid Dimka Giulia and Gala

Negative_Review: No bar to have a sit down and a drink no restaurant
Positive_Review: Great value for money for London Excellent choice of food for breakfast Rooms are super clean Great idea to have a small kitchen in the room

Negative_Review: Nothing material The cooked breakfast could have been hotter but there was a really good supply of continental options
Positive_Review: Great location nice room really friendly staff and comprehensive breakfast
Very nice staff willing to help Good and rich breakfast The room was very nice For us the location was good quiet but still close to the tube bicycle supemarket

Negative_Review: Any negatives are very small and would not prevent me from booking here again but deserve mentioning The room was so fabulous but the bed bordered on hard as a rock A firm bed is fine but this one was almost too firm and I d have to hesitate if booking for more than a couple days as it would become a problem on my joints Also I would highly recommend that the hotel put a dish towel in the room as I ended up wasting paper towels when drying dishes but didn t want to run the dishwasher for only a coffee cup or wine glass Lastly although checkout was at noon the housekeeper knocked on our door at 1030 and then stood outside waiting for us to leave She practically pushed past me as I rolled my suitcase out of the room a little weird and maybe a one off thing or a translation issue but still a bit rude as your final impression to an otherwise perfect stay
Positive_Review: This was an amazing hotel that I would absolutely book at again I looked at hundreds of hotels and I m so glad we booked this one The staff was probably the nicest I ve ever met their dog is super cute breakfast was fabulous and the location perfect The room was very comfortable and well appointed and even roomy by both UK and city standards Although it isn t a highend brand name well known hotel it certainly held its own The lobby is so cozy that you almost want to go sit down there and read Simple things like the still and sparkling water on tap in the lobby area as well as coffee and tea give it a very nice and welcoming vibe It s on the other side of the bridge and down the river from Big Ben a good 20 minute walk However the vauxhall tube stop is a short 5 minute walk away and then only two stops to the district and circle lines So you were far away enough from the tourists without being way outside of the city There is a great little pub just feet away and a big Tescos grocery store down the street maybe a 6 minute walk I would absolutely book here again and I encourage you to try it out

Negative_Review: Nothing in particular although I wonder if they had a problem with the drains when we were there as the room had a slightly strange smell
Positive_Review: Everything Staff fantastic Good location Lovely to take part in the manager s social The place has a nice atmosphere people actually talk to each other

nice location just a few minutes walk from Vauxhall underground and train station two supermarkets next to the station good breakfast nice and helpful staff comfortable mattress and bedding can cook inside the room free coffee for 24 hr lovely house dog

Negative_Review: There s a 5 minutes walk to the nearest Underground station but it s not so bad
Positive_Review: Everything is brand new there s complimentary coffee tea in the dinning area and a fully equipped kitchen in every suite Oh and they have the cutest hotel dog ever

Staff were very helpful Special thanks to Luca at reception and room was large The bathroom was nice which is always important All facilities new and more than adequate Would definately recommend to friends

Negative_Review: Weekend cleaning service only upon request
Positive_Review: Spacious rooms good location near to causal tube station nice breakfast 24hrs complimentary coffee and tea service really nice Very welcome happy and assisting staff Price wise considering location in London is reasonable Good wifi service

Negative_Review: There is hardly anything not to like Can t think of any
Positive_Review: Living at the Staybridge suites feels as comfortable as home Because of the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff and the comfort its rooms provide it was hard for me to leave at the end of my stay The staybridge rocks Looking forward to staying there again soonest

Negative_Review: Have to walk to the underground through a small park
Positive_Review: The hotel is brand new and very comfortable The kitchenette is exceptionally useful and made my stay even more relaxing All staff is particularly friendly and helpful

The design of the hotel was really chic I loved and my girlfriend certainly loved it being a surprise And there is a pantry for food and drink which is a great idea as is set up really well and breakfast is complimentary and the staff were so helpful and friendly I ll definitely be returning

Negative_Review: The bed was a little hard for my taste The wifi stopped working and needed assistance from the staff Seemed to happen to other customers as well
Positive_Review: Walking distance to Big Ben Parliament Westminster Abbey and other tourist locations The staff was excellent Large assortment in the morning breakfast buffet The suite was clean and modern

Negative_Review: Lack of restaurant choice in the near vicinity
Positive_Review: Large common area to sit relax and have a coffee tea and croissant any time of the day or night Close to transport including the tube and within walking distance to many attractions Staff very helpful and rooms clean great bathroom

Negative_Review: Only issue was the hard mattress in room 414 however staff did try to improve comfort by putting a softener over the mattress which did help a little The free wifi was hard to lock onto at times
Positive_Review: The very friendly staff and social evening gatherings promoted by management Everything in the same location and convenience
New facility VERY clean quiet and comfortable bedding and rooms Free laundry facility onsite Small kitchen area allowed cooking in room Tube station within 10 15 minute walk Helpful staff

Negative_Review: Didn t like the fact that there is no porter to help with usual handy stuffs when staying that long They should get some porters
Positive_Review: Had my reservations about the place when I initially booked online hence I changed my reservations from 7days to 3 days Just to have a feel first but I tell you that from my checking get in to checking out it was a wonderful surprise Great staff Tanjir Gregio spelling may be wrong etc

Everything was beyond amazing The hotel is beautiful very clean and comfortable Great breakfast provided every morning Staff is very pleasant and happy to help in every subject especially Luca You can have coffee or tea all day In addition you have a stable Wi Fi so we use extensively without problems Underground station is about 300 400 meters Very cute hotel dog we loved him

Negative_Review: it will be better if hotel can provide the twin bed roon which is suitable for travel with friends
Positive_Review: very nice and helpful staftt good location good breakfast very recommended

Negative_Review: The price was a bit expensive we reserved the room 1month before for approximately 250 night 190 night
Positive_Review: The room was a studio suite and it was a highstanding the staff is really nice and helpful coffee and tea free and available 24 24 and the last really great point of this hotel was the shop inside you can buy a good bottle of wine 24 24 for less than 24

The hotel is beautiful very clean and comfortable Good breakfast Several days a week there is a happy hour in the early evening so that those returning to relatively early that s great Staff are very pleasant and happy to help us in every subject Advantages There is a laundry room includes free drying machine And coffee all day In addition our joy was at a stable Wi Fi so we use extensively without problems Underground station is about 300 400 meters There are also several bus lines that range on the south side of the Thames and are 3 5 minutes walk away and very useful In short it is recommended

Negative_Review: Railway is very close to the place Some rooms look the other side but others look directly on it Noisy
Positive_Review: Personnel attitude comfortable bed wonderful laundry service good breakfast good location close to the tube station

The staff were all exceptionally friendly and helpful in particular Tim the Canadian and Luca who arranged a lovely birthday surprise of wine and chocolates in the room Everything was neat clean and comfortable and the happy hour was very enjoyable If we are ever back in London this is where we will stay

Negative_Review: The hotel s dog was a nuisance
Positive_Review: The helpful staff rooms are spotless well equipped beutiful and spacious Free 24 hours coffee machine with croissants finish by noon time Very close to center of London

Negative_Review: Lack of inventory in pantry Ill equipped gym No cleaning over the weekend Uncontrolled noise in the corridor sadly by the hotel staff themselves Weak wifi promise of stronger wifi on payment
Positive_Review: Spacious suit and its interior decoration

Negative_Review: I could not open the window more than a little and had to keep AC running
Positive_Review: don t miss the social evening great cheeses and wine on the house but what was best is the amazing atmosphere where all the hotel guest hang out together
Location is peaceful and relaxing the lobby is spacious and welcoming suites cosy and comfortable Staff are superb and a credit to the hotel loved the homemade cookies
Good location 10 minute walk to Vauxhall underground station Room was well equipped spacious and very quiet with no noise from outside ensuring a good nights sleep
The hotel is located close to the Tube train and bus routes making is easy to get around London It s also walking distance to many London attractions I am returning in October

Negative_Review: nothing really but the wifi was maybe a bit on the slow side
Positive_Review: huge rooms with kitchen ette very good beds good breakfast included walk in shower quiet rooms in a quiet area underground station nearby

The apartments are new and very clean The whole place has a modern feel to it All of the staff were very courteous and helpful but Almena was a star so friendly and personable I like the very large spaces downstairs comfortable and peaceful The breakfast was very good no bacon though and represents excellent value whilst reading the free newspapers Free tea and coffee 24 hours is also a lovely and unique touch Having a pantry of essentials is also a good idea My only small gripe would be the lack of natural light in my particular room 415

Staff was outstanding really attentive to the guests and great energy I love the mascot dog an incredibly creative idea and what a beautiful animal The space and decoration was very fresh and not overdone which isn t always the case in the UK

Really lucky to leave in this hotel it isbrand new and ambience is really mordern and people there are very nice especially the italian receptionist with glasees he is really dedicated polite and helpful His warm hospitality let us feel like at home Thank u a gain

Friendly staff great suite room very nice breakfast Saw reviews complaining about the location but I found it much better that it s located just outside too much busy London central area Would stay here every time I visit London

Negative_Review: Nothing negative to report truly excellent accommodation
Positive_Review: The staff on reception and at breakfast were all very friendly and helpful The breakfasts were excellent Complimentary tea coffee soft drinks available all day was appreciated
